https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/b3LRenpRSPkukLcO5hiIufVOeFA.jpg A man spends the night at an hotel in an unnamed city in southern Chile. It's late and he finds himself unable to sleep. He's bored. He feels confused about what to do next. He wishes to eat and to urinate. He's sexually excited. The image of a naked woman appears on the TV screen. Cinco hipótesis acerca de las turbulencias que pueden ocurrir una noche en una pieza de hotel
